about_the_game:
Alien Life Simulator is a rogue-lite, action-adventure game, set in an extraterrestrial
environment. Explore an alien universe and uncover the remnants of a highly advanced alien society. Fight for your life against hostile lifeforms in a fast paced adventure through the stars!

MANAGE YOUR EMOTIONS!

What is life without emotion? The emotions that your alien will experience will change the way you play. Your alien's emotions change what buffs are available to you, how much damage your guns do, and how often you can use your abilities. Emotions will change the way you experience life in the far reaches of space.

EXPLORE ALIEN WORLDS

With your randomly generated alien you will explore alien worlds and technology. Discover advanced weapons left behind and tablets with coordinates to other worlds.There are tons of secrets to find, portals to dive into, & deadly aliens to defeat in combat, so start your alien life today!

PLAY YOUR WAY

Mix together and build your own character to match your play style with:
  • 9 guns & 1 sword to pick from for the starting load out. Randomly find weapons as you play.
  • 4 stat distributions to pick from
  • 3 unique utility abilities and 4 damage abilities.
  • Customize the look of your alien before each run. Change body types, colors, and more.
  • Choose the order you tackle the biomes and bosses in! Difficulty scales to match your choice!

PROGRESS EVERY RUN

With every run Level up your profile and get access to new load out options. You'll unlock new guns and damage & utility abilities! And new options to customize the look of your alien!

DIFFERENT EVERY RUN

It'll feel different every time you play with:
  • 5 biomes, unique enemies for every biome, and variants on each biome. A total of 20 enemies.
  • 4 elite emotional variants of every enemy.
  • 47 different buffs you can get based on your alien's emotion as you play.
  • Random guns each run.
  • Randomly generated bosses. Their names, visuals, weapon, and emotion will change every run!

MORE FEATURES

  • Day night cycle.
  • Run history.

name: Alone in the Stars: Survivor

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Alone in the Stars: Survivor

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in an emotional adventure! Unleash powerful synergistic builds combining guns, powerups, and abilities of your choosing. But think carefully because they are all tied to your alien's emotions! Step through the gateway now and start exploring and defeating hostile alien worlds!
